Label: GOES-13 EPS (Energetic Particle Sensor) MagED (Magnetospheric Electron Detector) 1 minute electron fluxes 40-475 keV - NOAA NGDC and SWPC (sem.goes@noaa.gov)

DatasetLink.Title: archive and instrument documentation at NOAA National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC)

VariableDescription.Name: pitch_angles
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Pitch angles of MAGED and MAGPD telescopes 1-9 calculated from GOES magnetometer field vector
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************

#     PI_NAME                         NOAA NGDC and SWPC
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  sem.goes@noaa.gov
#     TEXT                            Data has been recast from original NOAA netCDF files by SPDF. DATA CAVEATS/WARNINGS:                   
#     TEXT                             The MagED data may not be accurate at times due to instrument limitations such                        
#     TEXT                             as dead time and proton contamination. Every effort is made to reduce these                           
#     TEXT                             effects but uncertainties are inevitable. Additionally, the detectors may suffer                      
#     TEXT                             from intermittent noise problems. Please contact Juan V. Rodriguez (sem.goes@noaa.gov)                
#                                      with questions or concerns.
